posts.postText: AngelBankia breaks a lot of the rules in the server.  He pirates and starts shooting at the prop hes standing on.  If you see him on the server.  Change your name and see what he does.
Ill try to get screenshots in the future

This belong more so in ban requests, although without proof there isn't much that can be done anyways.

Also please don't double post, use the edit button instead :)
Ive never seen Angel do anything wrong exept he might have pirated a couple of times. I think that this should be disregarded. Not my decission though.
will try to keep eye on him 0_0
